data.flavor: What do Faerie Dragons and Spectral Knights have in common?  They both love pasta!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Spectral Rider
data.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your hero.

data.name: Spectral Steed
data.text: Minions attacking this have a 50% chance to attack a different character.

data.name: Spiked Hogrider
data.text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain_Charge.
data.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

data.name: Spiteful Smith
data.text: Your weapon has +2 Attack while this is damaged.
data.flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

data.name: Spud M.E.
data.text: After this minion survives damage, switch sides.\nDeathrattle:_Destroy your hero.

data.name: Stalagg
data.text: Deathrattle: If Feugen also died this game, summon Thaddius.
data.flavor: Stalagg want to write own flavor text.  "STALAGG AWESOME!"
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Stampeding Kodo
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
data.flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

data.name: Steve Shimizu
data.text: Battlecry: Send an email to all friendly minions.

data.name: Stormpike Commando
data.flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.
data.howToGetGold: Unlocked at Paladin Level 51.

data.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
data.flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

data.name: Streetwise Investigator
data.flavor: "Hmmmm…  Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

data.name: Subject 9
data.flavor: The original clever girl.

data.name: Summoning Stone
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
data.flavor: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Sun Raider Phaerix
data.text: At the end of your turn, add a Blessing of the Sun to your hand.

data.name: Sunborne Val'kyr
data.flavor: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

data.name: Terri Wellman
data.text: Adjacent minions \nare Immune to fire spells. This is fine.

data.name: The Steel Sentinel
data.text: This minion can only take 1 damage at a time.

data.name: Timeway Wanderer
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Reduce its cost by (5) then put it on top of your deck.

data.name: Tomb Lurker
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nDeathrattle minion that died\nthis game to your hand.
data.flavor: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

data.name: Trogg Gloomeater
data.flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

data.name: Validated Doomsayer
data.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
data.flavor: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

data.name: Valithria Dreamwalker
data.text: Can't attack or be attacked while damaged.

data.name: Venomancer
data.flavor: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

data.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
data.flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

data.name: Wargear
data.flavor: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

data.name: Warlock on Fire
data.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion.

data.name: Wildlands Adventurer
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random card from the Hall of Fame to your hand.

data.name: Witchwood Grizzly
data.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Lose 1 Health for each card in your opponent's hand.
data.flavor: You know what they say about people with big hands? Small bears.

data.name: Yong Woo
data.text: Your other minions have +3 Attack and Charge.

data.name: Zilliax
data.flavor: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.

data.name: Zinaar
data.text: At the end of your turn, gain a wish.

data.name: Alex Tsang
data.text: Your Schedule is Immune to feature creep.

data.name: Ancient Harbinger
data.text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
data.flavor: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

data.name: Ancient of Blossoms
data.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

data.name: Arcane Dynamo
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (5) or more.
data.flavor: We ran out of jars, so we started putting brains in other stuff.

data.name: Archmage
data.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.
data.howToGetGold: Unlocked at Mage Level 57.

data.name: Argent Commander
data.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

data.name: Aya Blackpaw
data.flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

data.name: Ben Thompson
data.text: Battlecry: Draw some cards. With a pen.

data.name: Big-Time Racketeer
data.flavor: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

data.name: Bolf Ramshield
data.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
data.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

data.name: Bone Drake
data.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
data.flavor: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

data.name: Book Wyrm
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack.
data.flavor: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Boulderfist Ogre
data.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"
data.howToGetGold: Unlocked at Warlock Level 51.

data.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
data.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

data.name: Christian Scharling
data.text: Battlecry: Rearrange \n your minions to be \n more effective.

data.name: Chuck
data.text:
Discard all minions
from your hand and
deal their Attack to
the enemy hero.

data.name: Corrupted Seer
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
data.flavor: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

data.name: Damaged Stegotron
data.flavor: Sadly the warranty does not cover fireballs or acts of Boom.

data.name: David Pendergrast
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Cookie, destroy all bugs.

data.name: Defias Cleaner
data.flavor: His house cleaning service is quite thorough.  Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

data.name: Drakonid Crusher
data.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
data.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humanoid. But, like, why?
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Drakonid Slayer
data.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever he attacks.

data.name: Emperor Thaurissan
data.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
data.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Eric Dodds
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Pirate and destroy all Ninjas.

data.name: Evan Polekoff
data.text: Battlecry: Create a custom spell… in under 48 hours.

data.name: Fight Promoter
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na minion with 6 or more\n_Health, draw two cards.
data.flavor: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles.  No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

data.name: Frost Elemental
data.flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

data.name: Frozen Crusher
data.flavor: Goes by the online handle "KoolKrusher99."

data.name: Furnacefire Colossus
data.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
data.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

data.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
data.flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

data.name: Gazlowe
data.text: Whenever you cast a 1-Cost spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
data.flavor: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

data.name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
data.flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.
data.howToGetGold: This was rewarded to players who helped test the Store during the Beta.

data.name: Genn Greymane
data.text: [x]Start of Game: If your deck has only even- Cost cards, your starting Hero Power costs (1).
data.flavor: Ever since Sylvanas killed his son, he's dreamed of getting… even.

data.name: Grand Crusader
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
data.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

data.name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3)_or less.
data.flavor: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

data.name: Hogger
data.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with_Taunt.
data.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

data.name: Holy Book
data.text: Silence and destroy a minion. Summon a 10/10 copy of it.

data.name: Hungry Ettin
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
data.flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

data.name: Illidan Stormrage
data.text: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of_Azzinoth.
data.flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

data.name: Jomaro Kindred
data.text: Battlecry: TAKE any cards from your opponent's hand that they don't want.

data.name: Justicar Trueheart
data.text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
data.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

data.name: Kodorider
data.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

data.name: Leatherclad Hogleader
data.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
data.flavor: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

data.name: Lord of the Arena
data.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.
data.howToGetGold: Unlocked at Priest Level 59.

data.name: Madam Goya
data.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
data.flavor: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

data.name: Maexxna
data.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Master Jouster
data.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
data.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

data.name: Matthew Grubb
data.text: Battlecry: Fill both \n sides of the board with Carrion Grubs.

data.name: Mechanical Whelp
data.flavor: "Well if I didn't build the whelp and YOU didn't build the whelp…"

data.name: Mike Donais
data.text: Battlecry: Replace all minions in the battlefield, in both hands, and in both decks with random minions.

data.name: Missile Launcher
data.text: [x]Magnetic At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other characters.
data.flavor: We asked, "Where do the missiles go?" and he answered, "Yes."

data.name: Moat Lurker
data.flavor: He really enjoys lurking and gets a lot of job satisfaction out of it.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Mogor the Ogre
data.text: All minions have a 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
data.flavor: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.

data.name: Mogor's Champion
data.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
data.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

data.name: Moo...
data.text: Summon 3 Hell Bovines. Give all Hell Bovines Taunt.

data.name: Mossy Horror
data.flavor: The hills have eyes. And teeth. Pretty bad breath, too.

data.name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
data.flavor: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

data.name: Nalaa the Redeemer
data.text: [x]Divine Shield. Taunt.\nAfter this minion survives\n damage, gain Divine Shield.

data.name: Necrotic Geist
data.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
data.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

data.name: Nerubian Prophet
data.text: At the start of your turn, reduce this card's\nCost by (1).
data.flavor: It’s a self-reducing prophecy.

data.name: Nerubian Unraveler
data.flavor: He loves a good yarn.

data.name: Piloted Sky Golem
data.flavor: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

data.name: Priestess of Elune
data.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

data.name: Razorgore
data.text: At the start of your turn, give your minions +3 Attack.

data.name: Reckless Rocketeer
data.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.
data.howToGetGold: Unlocked at Shaman Level 59.

data.name: Reno Jackson
data.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
data.flavor: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Sabretooth Stalker
data.flavor: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

data.name: Scaled Nightmare
data.text: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
data.flavor: I like it because it scales.

data.name: Shadow Volley
data.text: Deal $3 damage to all non-Demon minions.

data.name: Sic 'Em
data.text: Summon 3 minions from your deck with the highest attack.

data.name: Sideshow Spelleater
data.flavor: Hey!  Let me try that...

data.name: Skeram Cultist
data.flavor: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

data.name: Skulking Geist
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy all\n1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
data.flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

data.name: Spark Drill
data.text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Add two\n1/1 Sparks with Rush to your hand.
data.flavor: Preferred weapon of Dr. Boom's orthodontist.

data.name: Spellweaver
data.flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

data.name: Stasis Dragon
data.text: Starts dormant.\nThis awakens with Rush after two turns.

data.name: Steal Life
data.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.

data.name: Sunwalker
data.flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

data.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
data.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

data.name: Tentacles
data.flavor: Where'd those come from?

data.name: The Beast
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
data.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

data.name: The Black Knight
data.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

data.name: The Skeleton Knight
data.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
data.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

data.name: Toshley
data.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
data.flavor: Something about power converters.

data.name: Unrelenting Rider
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Spectral Rider for your opponent.

data.name: Volcanic Drake
data.text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
data.flavor: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Wind-up Burglebot
data.text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw_a card.
data.flavor: Don't blame the bot for his crimes...  Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

data.name: Windfury Harpy
data.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

data.name: Wobbling Runts
data.flavor: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Wrathion
data.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
data.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

data.name: Azalina Soulthief
data.text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your_opponent's.
data.flavor: The cards are always golden on the other side.

data.name: Baron Geddon
data.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
data.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

data.name: Black Queen
data.text: Auto-Attack: Deal 4 damage to the enemies opposite this minion.

data.name: Blazecaller
data.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
data.flavor: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

data.name: Bog Creeper
data.flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

data.name: Bubba
data.text: Battlecry: Summon six 1/1 Bloodhounds to attack an enemy minion.

data.name: Camille Sanford
data.text: Battlecry: Give all \nDevs in your hand and deck +1 Swag.

data.name: Captured Jormungar
data.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

data.name: Chillmaw
data.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
data.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

data.name: Core Hound
data.flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.
data.howToGetGold: Unlocked at Hunter Level 51.

data.name: Corridor Creeper
data.text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is_in_your hand.
data.flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

data.name: Countess Ashmore
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Rush,\nLifesteal, and Deathrattle\ncard from your deck.
data.flavor: "1 minion… ah, ah, ah! 2 minions… ah, ah, ah! 3 minions… ah, ah, ah!"

data.name: Darkmire Moonkin
data.flavor: Birds of a feather Moonfire together.

data.name: Dean Ayala
data.text: You can't lose stars while this is in your deck.

data.name: Don Han'Cho
data.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
data.flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

data.name: Dr. Boom
data.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
data.flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

data.name: Fear
data.text: Destroy all enemy minions with 4 or less Attack.

data.name: Furious Ettin
data.flavor: One head is a morning person. The other head hates morning people.

data.name: Giggling Inventor
data.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
data.flavor: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

data.name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
data.flavor: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

data.name: Hallowed Water
data.text: Restore your hero\nto full Health.\n Draw 5 cards.

data.name: Hamilton Chu
data.text: Was successfully NOT part of the problem! ...most of the time.

data.name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
data.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
data.flavor: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

data.name: JC Park
data.text: Battlecry: Add a new platform for Hearthstone.

data.name: Locust Swarm
data.text: Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #3 Health to your hero.

data.name: Matt Place
data.text: Wait, wait! I’m having one of those things… it’s like a headache with pictures… oh right, AN IDEA!

data.name: Murozond
data.text: [x]Battlecry: From now on, your\n turns are 15 seconds and\n you draw 2 extra cards.

data.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
data.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

data.name: Rend Blackhand
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
data.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Sated Threshadon
data.flavor: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

data.name: Shifting Hourglass
data.text: [x]Take an extra turn. Costs (1) less for each Boss you've defeated this run.

data.name: Silver Vanguard
data.flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

data.name: Skycap'n Kragg
data.flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

data.name: Spiteful Summoner
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
data.flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

data.name: Star Aligner
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control 3\nminions with 7 Health, deal\n7 damage to all enemies.
data.flavor: "You're a Sagittarius? Me too! Just gimme a sec."

data.name: Steve Walker
data.text: Battlecry: If everything \n is on fire, Adapt. If it’s 3AM, Adapt again.

data.name: Stormwatcher
data.flavor: Aspiring meteorologist!

data.name: Stormwind Champion
data.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.
data.howToGetGold: Unlocked at Paladin Level 59.

data.name: The Curator
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
data.flavor: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Troggzor the Earthinator
data.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
data.flavor: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

data.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
data.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
data.flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

data.name: Volcanosaur
data.flavor: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"

data.name: War Golem
data.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?
